Delegation of IP6.ARPA
contents.zh-CHS: IP6.ARPA的授权

contents.text: Status of this Memo

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: This document discusses the need for delegation of the IP6.ARPA DNS zone, and specifies a plan for the technical operation thereof.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件讨论了授权IP6.ARPA DNS区域的必要性，并规定了技术操作计划。

contents.text: 1. Why IP6.ARPA?
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 为什么是IP6.ARPA？

contents.text: In the IPv6 address space, there is a need for 'reverse mapping' of addresses to DNS names analogous to that provided by the IN-ADDR.ARPA zone for IPv4.
contents.zh-CHS: 在IPv6地址空间中，需要将地址“反向映射”到DNS名称，类似于IPv4的In-ADDR.ARPA区域提供的DNS名称。

contents.text: The IAB recommended that the ARPA top level domain (the name is now considered an acronym for "Address and Routing Parameters Area") be used for technical infrastructure sub-domains when possible. It is already in use for IPv4 reverse mapping and has been established as the location for E.164 numbering on the Internet [RFC2916 RFC3026].
contents.zh-CHS: IAB建议尽可能将ARPA顶级域名（该名称现在被视为“地址和路由参数区域”的首字母缩写）用于技术基础设施子域。它已用于IPv4反向映射，并已被确定为Internet上E.164编号的位置[RFC2916 RFC3026]。

contents.text: IETF consensus was reached that the IP6.ARPA domain be used for address to DNS name mapping for the IPv6 address space [RFC2874].
contents.zh-CHS: IETF达成共识，IP6.ARPA域可用于IPv6地址空间的地址到DNS名称映射[RFC2874]。

contents.text: 2. Obsoleted Usage
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 过时的用法

contents.text: This document deprecates references to IP6.INT in [RFC1886] section 2.5, [RFC2553] section 6.2.3, [RFC2766] section 4.1, [RFC2772] section 7.1.c, and [RFC2874] section 2.5.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件不推荐[RFC1886]第2.5节、[RFC2553]第6.2.3节、[RFC2766]第4.1节、[RFC2772]第7.1.c节和[RFC2874]第2.5节中对IP6.INT的引用。

contents.text: In this context, 'deprecate' means that the old usage is not appropriate for new implementations, and IP6.INT will likely be phased out in an orderly fashion.
contents.zh-CHS: 在这种情况下，“deprecate”意味着旧用法不适合新的实现，IP6.INT可能会以有序的方式逐步淘汰。

contents.text: 3. IANA Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 3. IANA考虑

contents.text: This memo requests that the IANA delegate the IP6.ARPA domain following instructions to be provided by the IAB. Names within this zone are to be further delegated to the regional IP registries in accordance with the delegation of IPv6 address space to those registries. The names allocated should be hierarchic in accordance with the address space assignment.
contents.zh-CHS: 本备忘录要求IANA按照IAB提供的指示授权IP6.ARPA域。根据IPv6地址空间对区域IP注册中心的委托，该区域内的名称将进一步委托给区域IP注册中心。分配的名称应按照地址空间分配的层次结构。

contents.text: 4. Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 安全考虑

contents.text: While DNS spoofing of address to name mapping has been exploited in IPv4, delegation of the IP6.ARPA zone creates no new threats to the security of the internet.
contents.zh-CHS: 虽然IPv4中利用了地址到名称映射的DNS欺骗，但IP6.ARPA区域的授权不会对internet的安全造成新的威胁。
